long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Organize your daily tasks with DayTicks!

DayTicks is your daily task management tool designed to keep you organized and efficient. Seamlessly track your tasks, monitor your time, and get insightful daily summaries—all from a sleek and intuitive dashboard. No account needed 👍

🌟 What's New in Version 1.8

- 🕰️ Task Reminders: Set reminder intervals (e.g., 15, 30, 45, or 60 minutes) for each task. Receive notifications at the selected intervals while the task timer is running.
- 🔔 Improved Notifications: Get timely alerts for task reminders and status changes.
- 🛠️ Minor Bug Fixes: Enhanced stability and performance for a smoother experience.

⭐ Key Features:

- ⏲️ Efficient Task Management: Easily add, edit, delete, and toggle tasks between complete and incomplete.
- ⏳ Accurate Time Tracking: Start and stop timers for each task to track the time spent.
- 🏷️ Tags Filtering: Filter and organize tasks by tags for better management.
- 🏷️ Suggested Tags: Get suggestions for previously used tags when adding new tasks.
- 🕰️ Task Reminders: Set custom reminder intervals (e.g., 15, 30, 45, or 60 minutes) for tasks to stay on track. Notifications will alert you at the selected intervals while the timer is active.
- 🚫 Report Generation Control: Ensure accurate reporting by preventing report generation while a timer is running.
- 📊 Daily Summaries: View a summary of the total time spent on tasks for the day.
- 🚀 Generate Reports: Create reports of your tasks, including total tasks, completed tasks, and time spent.
- 🔽 Download Report: Download a detailed PDF report of your daily tasks.
- 🗑️ Clear All Tasks: Remove all tasks from the dashboard quickly and securely with a confirmation step.

DayTicks is designed to help you stay on top of your tasks and make the most of your time. Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone looking to enhance their productivity.

Support & Feedback:
For any questions or feedback, please contact us.
